Attribute Notes: Cold Blooded: -2 Vigor (cold weather effects)
Skills (17 Points):
Fighting: (agi) d8 Shooting: (agi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d8
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4 Throwing: (agi) d8
Languages: Anari; Finnari; Trader
Skill Notes:
Fast And Silent: No penalty for running Stealth
Salmon Leap: +1" jump
Size: 0 Deity: Scaetha
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 27 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 18; Skill: 5
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (9 points): Fast And Silent; Giant Killer; One Step One Kill; Retributive Strike; Salmon Leap; Spear Catch; Spear Twist; Steady Feet; Vengeful Strike Hindrances: Cold Blooded; Ruthless; Thin Skinned+ Finnar Human Features: Diverse
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (3) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Plate Corselet Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Axe (d8+d6); Maul (d8+d8); Sling (d8+d4 R4"); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Giant Killer: +1d6 damage vs. foes of size 3 or greater
Maul Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
One Step One Kill: May move 1" w/out triggering first strike; may spend Benny for the Drop
Retributive Strike: May make free melee attack upon incapacitation
Salmon Leap: Ignore 1 point of shield Parry
Spear Catch: Successful Agility test catches thrown spear (Raise returns throw) 1/rd
Spear Twist: Thrown spear does +1 Strength step damage
Steady Feet: +1 Size vs. knockback
Vengeful Strike: May make free melee attack upon adjacent ally incapacitation
Arcana
Powers:
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R6" Target gains +1 trait step or suffers -1 trait step (Raise +2 or -2 (Spirit neg)) for 3 rd
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Restores 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr
Quickness: (4 PP) RTouch Target gains second action (Raise also redraw Action Cards below 8) while maintained
Summon Herald: (8 PP) R12" Brings herald of deity for support
Weaken Undead: (3 PP) R4" Target undead loses undead ability (Spirit neg) while maintained
